para: The query_color parameter governs the color of the primary object being displayed in the toolbox. Clicking on the name of another Skeleton component in the toolbox highlights that component with the peek_color.

Nodes are displayed with a dot of radius node_size, Elements are displayed by drawing their perimeter with lines of width element_width, and Segments are displayed with lines of width segment_width. All three of these parameters are integers, in units of the screen pixel size.

A single SkeletonInfoDisplay is created automatically in each Graphics Window and is not normally visible in the window's layer list. To edit its properties, first select List All Layers in the graphics window's Settings menu.
